title: 07/28/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/28/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Packers making a trade for WR Randall Cobb in hopes to rebuild the relationship with Rodgers. The Athletic released their QB 1-4 Tier List having both Aaron Rodgers and Patrick Mahomes tied for best quarterback in the league. Great players throughout history don't leave teams, they leave bad organizations. Plus, Colin tips his cap to Aaron Rodgers spilling all the beans on his future with the Packers during his press conference!


Guest: Warren Moon

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
